title: Migration to VK Cloud
pageDescription: How to transfer a VM image or a whole infrastructure to the VK Cloud.
shortDescription: How to transfer a VM image or a whole infrastructure to the VK Cloud
metaDescription: How to transfer a VM image or a whole infrastructure to the VK Cloud
markdown: VK Cloud supports migration of both individual VMs and the infrastructure as a whole. For the first, it is recommended to use external tools (VM Ware, Hyper-V), for the second â€” [Hystax software](/en/applications-and-services/marketplace/initial-configuration/migrate-hystax), operating on the basis of VK Cloud.
